name: Big Bro Adventure
description:
This game was made in 2 hours as a challenge for a video.Updates for it will so it doesn´t feel that short  be out soon.

Story/Goal of game :You are rolling up the tent and getting everything packed off in your bagpack but suddenly ,through space and time ,monsters arrive out of yellow portals and you still have to find your food source and money .The trip out of the mountain is a long one ,so you must find everything you need to get out of there with ! 

Ps: After collecting a certain number of Points,a way more difficult contraption will be visible,which was made for the ones who want to have more replay value of the game.

Controlls:

W - Jump   / A - left move / D - Right move / k - Speed up Player / L - s+throw rocks at enemies  ( +Button -to go back to menu / Escape Button - to close off the game)
